posts.name: John Enoh
posts.cooked:
Send your CV to invest@emoneypond.com
You will work remotely
Programming Languages:
- Java
- HTML 5
- Javascript (ECMAScript 5.1)
Frameworks:
- Spring Framework (4.x)
- AngularJS (1.5.x)
Database:
- PostgreSQL 9.x
Specifications:
- JPA (Java Persistence API)
- QueryDSL (Query Domain Specific Language)
- RESTful API / REST API
Programming methodologies:
- OOP (Object Oriented Programming)
- AOP (Aspect Oriented Programming)
- Meta-Programming
Design methodologies:
- Material Design
- Responsive Design

posts.name: Salisu Titus
posts.cooked: This looks more like a course outline

posts.name: Seun LanLege
posts.cooked:
You expect one Person to know all these?

Goodluck finding him /her

posts.name: Sammy
posts.cooked: Be patient, GOD will provide him/her.

posts.name: olaar Agboola
posts.cooked: Funniest part is the pay would be like N100k or even less . SMH Nija dev don suffer.

posts.name: Ebuka Valentine
posts.cooked: When you are a lady and looking for the RIGHT guy..

posts.name: Olatunji Oduro
posts.cooked: Seriously? These are skills for like 3 or 4 different developers. Its funny you expect one person to know all these and for how much sef?

posts.name: Onyeka Aghanenu
posts.cooked: LOL at this list. Something tells me OP doesn't know what most of these things even do.

posts.name: Sola Akindolu
posts.cooked: I agree with you. Another thing tells me this is fraud, but I hope to be wrong.

posts.name: Sammy
posts.cooked:
Okay, he's here. .
The suitable candidate for the job.

posts.name: Capestro
posts.cooked:
Oshey Emoneypond. Awon eyan Mr Mavro.

Ride on. The developer will be sent from heaven. Just fast for three days.

posts.name: Joseph
posts.cooked: The reason we don't have specialization in this country , Op do you kno half of those things

posts.name: Oriname Agbi
posts.cooked: Buhahahaha! Goodluck!!!

posts.name: Ojo Oluwaleke
posts.cooked: Sometimes i wonder if they read their vacancy ads before posting it or maybe they don't even understand what they have written (google-copy-paste-post)

posts.name: John Enoh
posts.cooked:
The details is nothing but what Java experience developer could know!
must all comment? All those detail is expected that a java Developer should know in the age!

posts.name: Sola Akindolu
posts.cooked: Baba, learn how to post a job. And move on. Your post is getting all negative reviews because it's shit. Now will you keep kwayet, or see how other guys post their jobs. And these are not exactly unknown startups like yours. Have fun with your emoney.

posts.name: Bibiana AMOS
posts.cooked: A startup? Okay

posts.name: VaNessa
posts.cooked: Devs are not magicians...

posts.name: Eric Effiong
posts.cooked: One person with all this skills? Even Google won't demand this much.

posts.name: Kish
posts.cooked: You didn't mention that He or she must be proficient in all Adobe CC suite softwares, strong graphic design background and good knowledge of UX design.
